channel.title: Toolbox on ToastIT
channel.description: Recent content in Toolbox on ToastIT

item.title: Universal Automation: An Early Look
item.description: Chances are good that if you’ve been around any part of the PowerShell community during the past couple of years, you’ve at least heard of Universal Dashboard (UD). If, somehow, you haven’t heard of it yet UD is a product from Ironman Software , which is headed up by Adam Driscoll . It started as a tool focused on easily spinning up dashboards using PowerShell and has since developed into a full-on web framework.
